Sentencas: Ni/Y2O3-ZrO2 (Ni/YSZ) cermets are the most common anode materials for high temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Development of Ni/Y2O3-ZrO2 cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrode performance of Ni/YSZ cermets is critically dependent on the microstructure and distribution of Ni and YSZ phases in the cermets.
Titulo: Development of Ni/Y2O3-ZrO2 cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This in turn is closely related to the characteristics of the NiO and YSZ powders, and the fabrication process.
Titulo: Development of Ni/Y2O3-ZrO2 cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The objective of this paper is to discuss some important issues associated with the fabrication and development of Ni/Y2O3-ZrO2 anode materials for SOFC from the viewpoint of materials science and technology.
Titulo: Development of Ni/Y2O3-ZrO2 cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Results indicate that the optimisation of Ni/YSZ cermet anodes is a complicated process and understanding of the H-2 oxidation reaction is also very important in the development of high performance Ni/YSZ cermet anodes.
Titulo: Development of Ni/Y2O3-ZrO2 cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells
